    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:8a7d2261-9795-46d6-87c8-dca200171aff</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>8a7d2261-9795-46d6-87c8-dca200171aff</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az egyenletes körmozgás</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Uniform Circular Motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Konstante Kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Mouvement Circulaire Uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Movimento Circular Uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Movimento Della Circonvallazione 
Dell'Uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ομοιόμορφη κυκλική κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Movimiento Circular Uniforme</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az egyenletes körmozgás jellemző mennyiségei (periódusidő, fordulatszám, kerületi sebesség, szögsebesség, gyorsulás) és az ezek közötti összefüggések, kapcsolatok.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Characetristic Quantities of the Uniform Circular Motion (Periodic Time, Revolution, Circumferential Velocity, Angular Velocity,Acceleration) and Their Correlations, Connections</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">fizika</string>
            <string language="en-US">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">haladó mozgás</string>
            <string language="en-US">translational motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">körmozgás</string>
            <string language="en-US">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">szögsebesség</string>
            <string language="en-US">angular velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">centripetális gyorsulás</string>
            <string language="en-US">centripetal acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Characetristic Quantitäten der konstanten 
kreisförmigen Bewegung (periodische Zeit, Umdrehung, 
Umfangsgeschwindigkeit, Winkelgeschwindigkeit, Beschleunigung) und 
ihrer Wechselbeziehungen, Anschlüsse</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quantités de Characetristic du mouvement 
circulaire uniforme (temps périodique, révolution, vitesse 
circulaire, vitesse angulaire, accélération) et de leurs 
corrélations, connexions</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quantidades de Characetristic do movimento 
circular uniforme (tempo periódico, volta, velocidade 
circunferencial, velocidade angular, acceleration) e de suas 
correlações, conexões</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quantità di Characetristic del movimento 
circolare dell'Uniforme (tempo periodico, giro, velocità della 
circonferenza, velocità angolare, accelerazione) e di loro 
correlazioni, collegamenti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποσότητες Characetristic της ομοιόμορφης κυκλικής 
κίνησης (περιοδικός χρόνος, επανάσταση, περιφερειακή ταχύτητα, 
γωνιακή ταχύτητα, ταχύτητα) και συσχετισμών τους, συνδέσεις</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cantidades de Characetristic del movimiento 
circular Uniforme (tiempo periódico, revolución, velocidad 
circunferencial, velocidad angular, aceleración) y de sus 
correlaciones, conexiones</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">translational Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkelgeschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zentripetale Beschleunigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement de translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement circulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vitesse angulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">accélération centripète</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento translational</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento circular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">velocidade angular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">acceleration centripetal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento translational</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento circolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">velocità angolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">accelerazione centripeta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μεταφραστική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυκλική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνιακή ταχύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κεντρομόλος ταχύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento de translación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento circular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">velocidad angular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aceleración centrípeta</string>
          </keyword>
